summary: The Alien Removal Not Resort Stays Act (H.R. 1485) aims to terminate the Shelter and Services Program of the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA). The bill prohibits the appropriation of federal funds to the program, including any successor programs, starting from the date of enactment. Unobligated funds previously allocated to the FEMA program will be transferred to U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) for enforcement, detention, and removal operations.
